mongodbDatabaseArticles.content:
The “sensual love” picture (at the top of this page) came from Peaceluvbug‘s recent trip to Spain.

“Sensual Love” was an upscale sex shop on Las Ramblas in Barcelona. It was pretty close to our hostel and had many kinky funny things in the window… but very classy.

I wonder if the inside was kinkier…but I guess we’ll never know since she didn’t go in. Right??
mongodbDatabaseArticles.title: Sensual Love Top
